Class Controller

java.lang.Object
_3024c.heroregistry.controllers.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
@Component public class Controller extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class contains all the logic for the dash page its startup and button clicks on it. This serves as the main class containing all the logic behind the functionality

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final record 
    Controller.ImportResult
    ImportResult this helper method simply tallies the result fed to it the parameters are number of successfully imported lines, failed lines, and the exception object thrown the return type is containing ok if truth and eror object if contains false.

    • copyHeroesFromOriginal

      public int copyHeroesFromOriginal()
      copyHeroesFromOriginal (file to list) -> (Db to List) this method makes sure that the data in the original file is inside heroes List. Used before mutations to maintain the order of data and update chosen source of truth(temporary heroes' list until Db). there are no parameters needed for this method
      Returns:
      the return type is int, will return int of total records

      heroDelete this method searches Heroes for matching id and removes if found then uses fileWrite to reflect deletion in text file.
